comment.text: This translation key is used for the title "Sync LDAP data" and appears as a page title in the Portal Settings. It provides context for users navigating to the synchronization settings within LDAP integration.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'LDAP məlumatlarını sinxronizasiya edin' is a very literal translation. A more natural and idiomatic translation would be 'LDAP məlumatlarını yeniləyin' or 'LDAP məlumatlarını uyğunlaşdırın'. The term 'sinkronizasiya edin' feels somewhat formal and less commonly used in this context.

The Lao translation 'ຊິງຂໍ້ມູນ LDAP' is a literal transliteration of 'Sync data LDAP' and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Sync LDAP data'. 'ຊິງ' implies taking or grabbing, which isn't the intended action. A more accurate translation would focus on synchronization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອັບເດດຂໍ້ມູນ LDAP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala word 'සමමුහුර්ත' (samamuhuwrta) is technically correct but a more natural and common term for 'sync' in this context might be 'අsynchronize' (asinkronize) or 'එකතු කිරීම' (ekathu kirima).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'එල්ඩීඒපී දත්ත එකතු කිරීම' (Ldap data ekathu kirima) or 'එල්ඩීඒපී දත්ත අsynchronize කිරීම'.
